name: Engage!
description:
Engage in 2-player space combat inspired by Star Control 2 Melee! Choose from 3 distinct ships and 4 arenas.

  • Play alone against AI or 2-player with keyboard and/or XBOX 360-controllers
  • If you enjoyed Star Control 2 (as we certainly did), this is a must-try!
  • Totally free of charge!
  • Also available for OUYA!

(c) 2014 Digital Apathy - http://engage.digital-apathy.com
